scripts.start:dev: concurrently "DEV=1 npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.build: npm run deps:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:sapo
scripts.build:client: npm run deps:client && cd client && npm run build
scripts.build:docker: npm run build:client && npm run clean:sapo && docker build . -t
scripts.dev: echo "This command has been deprecated. Use 'npm start'" && exit 1
